name: Mustard Greens 'n Beans
author: Fishnets
summary: Simple and satisfying! Serve as a side dish or as a main course vegetarian meal with crusty bread and a glass of red wine.
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste
½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
1 pound mustard greens, washed and chopped
1 (15 ounce) can cannellini (white kidney) beans, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: In a large Dutch oven over medium heat, heat the olive oil; cook and stir onion and garlic until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes
In a bowl, mix vinegar, water, sugar, dry mustard, and red pepper flakes until sugar has dissolved
Place the   into the onion and garlic mixture, and pour in the vinegar mixture
Stir to combine, cover the Dutch oven, and bring to a boil
Simmer the greens until the liquid has been absorbed, 5 to 10 minutes
Mix in the white beans, allow to heat through, and season to taste with salt and black pepper
